rules_text:
{6}{W}, {T}: Exile target creature.
{6}{U}, {T}: Scry 3, then draw three cards.
{6}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
{6}{R}, {T}: Creatures you control get +3/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
{6}{G}, {T}: Distribute five +1/+1 counter among any number of target creatures.
